Key:
Excuse meeeee. Reine-san, are you around?
I was going to invite Kotori to grab a bite to
eat—Oh. She's not here.
Mmm... A phone call?! Speak of the devil.
Hey, Kotori. What's the matter?
Oh, Shido? You had PE today, right? Did you\nbring your gym clothes?
Huh...? Y-Yeah, I did... Why?
Oh... I-I see. A-As long as you did,\nthat's fine.
I... Is that all?
What? Got a problem with that? I mean, I don't\nwant a situation where you enter class naked,\nsending Tohka's emotional state into chaos.

Even if I did forget my clothes, it wouldn't
pan out like that!
Hmph. We'll see.
You know...
So long as you didn't forget them,\nit's fine. Bye!
Oh, Kotori...
What?!

Thanks for looking out. I feel so much better
after hearing your voice.
...! D-Don't be stupid!
I don't have time to waste! I'm hanging up!
Oh, hey! Why don't we have lunch toge—
...Sh-She hung up.

(But... I wonder what Kotori called me for?
Maybe she wanted to hear my voice, too.)
Nahhh. No way.

Oh well. I'll just head for class and eat my
lunch.
